trans-unit.source: Use SQL Database from .NET (C#)
trans-unit.target: Use SQL Database from .NET (C#)

trans-unit.source: Use the sample code in this quick start to build a modern application with C# and backed by a powerful relational database in the cloud with Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: Use the sample code in this quick start to build a modern application with C# and backed by a powerful relational database in the cloud with Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: Using SQL Database from .NET (C#)
trans-unit.target: Using SQL Database from .NET (C#)

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requirements

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework is pre-installed with Windows.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework is pre-installed with Windows.

trans-unit.source: For Linux and Mac OS X you can download .NET Framework from the [Mono Project](http://www.mono-project.com/).
trans-unit.target: For Linux and Mac OS X you can download .NET Framework from the [Mono Project](http://www.mono-project.com/).

trans-unit.source: A SQL Database
trans-unit.target: A SQL Database

trans-unit.source: See the [getting started page](sql-database-get-started.md) to learn how to create a sample database and get your connection string.
trans-unit.target: See the [getting started page](sql-database-get-started.md) to learn how to create a sample database and get your connection string.

trans-unit.source: Connect to your SQL Database
trans-unit.target: Connect to your SQL Database

trans-unit.source: The [System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection class](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlconnection.aspx) is used to connect to SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The [System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection class](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlconnection.aspx) is used to connect to SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: Execute a query and retrieve the result set
trans-unit.target: Execute a query and retrieve the result set

trans-unit.source: The [System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlcommand.aspx) and [SqlDataReader](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqldatareader.aspx) classes can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The [System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlcommand.aspx) and [SqlDataReader](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqldatareader.aspx) classes can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: Note that System.Data.SqlClient also supports retrieving data into an offline [System.Data.DataSet](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.dataset.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Note that System.Data.SqlClient also supports retrieving data into an offline [System.Data.DataSet](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.dataset.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Inserting a row, passing parameters, and retrieving the generated primary key value
trans-unit.target: Inserting a row, passing parameters, and retrieving the generated primary key value

trans-unit.source: In SQL Database the [IDENTITY](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms186775.aspx) property and the [SEQUENECE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff878058.aspx) object can be used to auto-generate [primary key](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms179610.aspx) values.
trans-unit.target: In SQL Database the [IDENTITY](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms186775.aspx) property and the [SEQUENECE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff878058.aspx) object can be used to auto-generate [primary key](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms179610.aspx) values.

trans-unit.source: In this example you will see how to execute an [insert-statement](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms174335.aspx), safely pass parameters which protects from [SQL injection](https://msdn.microsoft.com/magazine/cc163917.aspx), and retrieve the auto-generated primary key value.
trans-unit.target: In this example you will see how to execute an [insert-statement](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms174335.aspx), safely pass parameters which protects from [SQL injection](https://msdn.microsoft.com/magazine/cc163917.aspx), and retrieve the auto-generated primary key value.

trans-unit.source: The [ExecuteScalar](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlcommand.executescalar.aspx) method in the [System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlcommand.aspx) class can be used to execute a statement and retrieve the first column and row returned by this statement.
trans-unit.target: The [ExecuteScalar](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlcommand.executescalar.aspx) method in the [System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlcommand.aspx) class can be used to execute a statement and retrieve the first column and row returned by this statement.

trans-unit.source: The [OUTPUT](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms177564.aspx) clause of the INSERT statement can be used to return the inserted values as a result set to the calling application.
trans-unit.target: The [OUTPUT](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms177564.aspx) clause of the INSERT statement can be used to return the inserted values as a result set to the calling application.

trans-unit.source: Note that OUTPUT is also supported by the [UPDATE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms177523.aspx), [DELETE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms189835.aspx) and [MERGE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb510625.aspx) statements.
trans-unit.target: Note that OUTPUT is also supported by the [UPDATE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms177523.aspx), [DELETE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms189835.aspx) and [MERGE](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb510625.aspx) statements.

trans-unit.source: If more than one row is inserted you should use the [ExecuteReader](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlcommand.executereader.aspx) method to retrieve the inserted values for all rows.
trans-unit.target: If more than one row is inserted you should use the [ExecuteReader](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.data.sqlclient.sqlcommand.executereader.aspx) method to retrieve the inserted values for all rows.
